              var tocTitle = document.createElement("h3");
              tocTitle.innerText = "Navigation";
              toc.appendChild(tocTitle);

              var headers = document.querySelectorAll("h2, h3, h4");
              headers.forEach(function (header, index) {
                  if (!header.id) {
                      header.id = "section-" + index;
                  }

                  var link = document.createElement("a");
                  link.innerText = header.innerText;
                  link.href = "#" + header.id;
                  link.style.display = "block";
                  link.style.padding = "5px 0";
                  link.style.color = "#007bff";
                  link.style.textDecoration = "none";

                  toc.appendChild(link);
              });

              button.style.position = "fixed";
              button.style.top = "15px";
              button.style.right = "15px";
              button.style.backgroundColor = "white";
              button.style.color = "#333";
              button.style.border = "2px solid #ccc"; // Slightly thicker border
              button.style.padding = "10px 12px"; // Increased padding

              button.style.width = "50px"; // Increase button size
              button.style.height = "50px"; // Make it square

              document.body.appendChild(button);

              // Click event to toggle the ToC
              button.addEventListener("click", function () {
                  if (toc.style.right === "0px") {
                      toc.style.right = "-300px"; // Hide ToC
                  } else {
                      toc.style.right = "0px"; // Show ToC
                  }

              // Toggle collapsible content
              document.querySelectorAll(".collapse-button").forEach(button => {
                  button.addEventListener("click", function () {
                      const content = this.nextElementSibling;
                      const arrow = this.querySelector(".arrow");
                      const isExpanded = this.getAttribute("aria-expanded") === "true";
                      content.style.display = isExpanded ? "none" : "block";
                      this.setAttribute("aria-expanded", !isExpanded);
                  });
                  button.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");
              });

# {{< iconify fluent-emoji-high-contrast detective >}} Detecting AI-Generated Content {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break .btn-green}
## {{< iconify fluent-emoji-high-contrast detective >}} Detecting AI-Generated Content {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break .btn-green}
<blockquote class="question-text">
How confident are you that the following groups can tell the difference between content created by AI and content created by people?
<button class="collapse-button" type="button"><span class="arrow"></span></button>
<ul class="details-content" style="margin-top: 1em; padding-left: 20px; display: none;"><li>Topic1: People from the general population</li>
<li>Topic2: Members of Parliament</li>
<li>Topic3: Judges</li>
<li>Topic4: Journalists</li>
<li>Topic5: Police officers</li>
<li>Topic6: Doctors</li>
<li>Topic7: Friends/family</li>
<li>Topic8: Yourself</li></ul></blockquote>
::: {.panel-tabset}
# May 2025 {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break}
::: {.panel-tabset}
## Overall
```{r}
viz_general(vecc("CONF", 1:8), c("People from the general population", "Members of Parliament", "Judges", "Journalists", "Police officers", "Doctors", "Friends/family", "Yourself"), c("Confident (5-7)", "Somewhat confident (4)", "Not confident (1-3)"), data = dat3)
```


# Over Time
```{r}
var_labels <-
c("People from the general population", "Members of Parliament", "Judges", "Journalists", "Police officers", "Doctors", "Friends/family", "Yourself")
categories_dat <-
c("Confident (5-7)", "Somewhat confident (4)", "Not confident (1-3)")
```
::: {.panel-tabset}
## Overall
::: {.panel-tabset}
```{r, results="asis"}
graphics <- viz_wave_change(vecc("CONF", 1:8), var_labels, rev(categories_dat), wavevar = "wave", range1 = 1:3, range2 = 4, range3 = 5:7)
generate_quarto_elements(graphics)
```
:::
## By Age
::: {.panel-tabset}
```{r, results="asis"}
list_of_plots <- viz_wave_change3(data = data, vars = vecc("CONF", 1:8), range3 = 5:7, display_range = 5:7, var_labels = var_labels, categories_dat = categories_dat, wave_var = "wave", group_by_var = "age_groups", y_axis_label = "% of Respondents who chose Confident (5-7)", facet_by_group = F)
tiptext <- "You can hover or click on the legend to highlight, remove or add groups, which can make the chart easier to read.<br><strong>Percentage shows those that chose Confident (5-7).</strong>"
generate_quarto_elements(list_of_plots)
```

# {{< iconify mingcute safe-lock-fill >}} Trust in ADM Systems {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break .btn-green}
## {{< iconify mingcute safe-lock-fill >}} Trust in ADM Systems {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break .btn-green}
<blockquote class="question-text">
We ask you a number of additional questions about automatic decision-making (ADM) systems. These are computer programs that make decisions that used to be made by people. These decisions are made automatically by computers based on data.<br><br><b>How much do you trust automated decision-making systems to properly determine...</b>
<button class="collapse-button" type="button"><span class="arrow"></span></button>
<ul class="details-content" style="margin-top: 1em; padding-left: 20px; display: none;"><li>Topic1: Social Welfare</li>
<li>Topic2: The News You See</li>
<li>Topic3: Cancer Diagnosis</li></ul></blockquote>

# {{< iconify game-icons sands-of-time >}} Future of ADM Systems {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break .btn-green}
## {{< iconify game-icons sands-of-time >}} Future of ADM Systems {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break .btn-green}
<blockquote class="question-text">
If automated decision-making (ADM) becomes more common in the future, what do you think will happen?
<button class="collapse-button" type="button"><span class="arrow"></span></button>
<ul class="details-content" style="margin-top: 1em; padding-left: 20px; display: none;"><li>Topic1: If the news is automated, journalists will be able to focus more on investigative journalism.</li>
<li>Topic2: I will only get news items that interest me.</li>
<li>Topic3: It will make reporting fairer and more balanced.</li>
<li>Topic4: If certain law enforcement tasks are automated, the police will have more time to focus on major crimes.</li>
<li>Topic5: It will make the determination of social benefits fairer and more balanced.</li></ul></blockquote>
::: {.panel-tabset}
# Results (Wave 1) {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break}
::: {.panel-tabset}
## Overall
```{r}
viz_general(vecc("ADSO", 1:5), c("If the news is automated, journalists will be able to focus more on investigative journalism.", "I will only get news items that interest me.", "It will make reporting fairer and more balanced.", "If certain law enforcement tasks are automated, the police will have more time to focus on major crimes.", "It will make the determination of social benefits fairer and more balanced."), c("Agree (5-7)", "Neither agree or disagree (4)", "Disagree (1-3)"), data = dat)
```
## By Age

# {{< iconify mdi alert-circle-outline >}} Concerns About AI {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break .btn-green}

```{r, results="asis"}
graphics <- viz_wave_change(c("AI_PERCEP"), var_labels, rev(categories_dat), wavevar = "wave", range1 = 1:3, range2 = 4, range3 = 5:7)
```
